overview:
Scott MacGregor is Co-Founder and head engineer at Postbox Inc.

Leveraging his prior decade of experience in developing email applications for Netscape and Mozilla Corporation, together with Sherman Dickman, Scott created Postbox to make email more powerful and efficient.

Prior to founding Postbox, Scott was a lead engineer at Mozilla Corporation.

Beginning in February 2003, Scott and a colleagueâ€™s after-hours efforts led to the invention of Thunderbird.

Scott started out his career developing e-mail and messenger products at Netscape, which became the roots of Mozillaâ€™s Thunderbird e-mail client.

Scott holds a Masters in Engineering from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
